column4: i installed 10.10 yesterday in hyperv, isntalled the modules per a tutorial, set static ip, installed webmin, set hostname, setup a cron job to sync to time server on my network, rebooted it,  and i get .461320 Kernel panic - not syncing: VFS: Unable to mount root fs on unknown-block(0,0) PID:1 comm: swapper not tainted 2.6.35-28-server #50-Ubuntu, but if i boot into an earlier kernel it seems to be fine
Try the same... With the Ubuntu 11.04
